sentences.english: some drink from the fountain of knowledge, but he just gargled.
sentences.chinese: 人家畅饮智慧之泉，他只是拿来漱口了。

sentences.english: The fear of the Lord, which is the beginning of wisdom, consists in a complete devotion to God.
sentences.chinese: 敬畏耶和华是智慧的开端，是在于完全委身于神。

sentences.english: Always get along long before he discovered the great wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 总是相处很久才会发现他的大智慧。

sentences.english: Which wise men have told from their fathers, and have not hid it
sentences.chinese: 就是智慧人从列祖所受，传说而不隐瞒的。

sentences.english: The fruit did bring death to humankind.
sentences.chinese: 智慧果会带给人类死亡。

sentences.english: Through self-awareness and self-knowledge only can come tranquillity and wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 通过自我意识和自知才能有宁静和智慧。

sentences.english: The world urgently needs the ancient wisdom of the East.
sentences.chinese: 世界需要流传了数千年之久的东方智慧。

sentences.english: Her success in polities stems from hard work and intelligence.
sentences.chinese: 她政治上的成功来自刻苦和智慧。

sentences.english: These projects showed the wisdom and innovativeness of the participating students.
sentences.chinese: 这些资助项目反映出大学生们的智慧和创造力。

sentences.english: I enjoy productive players with intelligence and the capacity to make everyone around them more productive.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢这种用自己的智慧和能力盘活全队的球员。

sentences.english: This is clever visualization and art work.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个充满智慧的形象艺术作品。

sentences.english: This is when a deeper wisdom can take over and offer better insights.
sentences.chinese: 这时高深的智慧就接管了一切，并给出更好的见识。

sentences.english: The Buddha reaches us that we should turn our emotions into our wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 佛法教给我们，要把感情转变成智慧。

sentences.english: Mahamudra is primordial wisdom that we experience through meditation.
sentences.chinese: “大手印”指的是我们通过禅修体验到的俱生智慧。

sentences.english: Ask God to give you and your spouse the wisdom and discipline to manage money well.
sentences.chinese: 求神给你和你的爱人有智慧和节制来把钱管理好。

sentences.english: Ulysses is not difficult to read, and it richly rewards each reader in wisdom and pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 尤利西斯》不难读，它会给每位读者以智慧和愉悦。
